00110     def __init__(
00111         self,
00112         engine=None,
00113         **args):
00114 
00115         gtk.Window.__init__(self, **args)
00116 
00117         self.connect('destroy', gtk.main_quit)
00118         self.connect('realize', self.handleRealize)
00119         self.connect('size-allocate', self.handleResize)
00120 
00121         self.set_title("Open Source Micropolis on Python / GTK / Cairo / Pango")
00122 
00123         self.firstResize = True
00124 
00125         self.engine = engine
00126 
00127         engine.expressInterest(
00128             self,
00129             ('gameMode',))
00130 
00131         # Make the big map view.
00132 
00133         editMapView = micropolisdrawingarea.EditableMicropolisDrawingArea(
00134                 engine=self.engine)
00135         self.editMapView = editMapView
00136 
00137         # Make the navigation map view.
00138 
00139         navigationMapView = micropolisdrawingarea.NavigationMicropolisDrawingArea(
00140                 engine=self.engine)
00141         self.navigationMapView = navigationMapView
00142         navigationMapView.set_size_request(
00143             micropolisengine.WORLD_W,
00144             micropolisengine.WORLD_H)
00145 
00146         # Make the gauge view.
00147 
00148         gaugeView = micropolisgaugeview.MicropolisGaugeView(engine=self.engine)
00149         self.gaugeView = gaugeView
00150 
00151         # Make the vbox for the gauge and navigation map views.
00152 
00153         vbox1 = gtk.VBox(False, 0)
00154         self.vbox1 = vbox1
00155 
00156         # Make the notebooks.
00157 
00158         modeNotebook = gtk.Notebook()
00159         self.modeNotebook = modeNotebook
00160         modeNotebook.set_group_id(0)
00161         modeNotebook.set_show_tabs(False)
00162 
00163         startPanel = micropolisstartpanel.MicropolisStartPanel(
00164             engine=engine,
00165             target=self)
00166         self.startPanel = startPanel
00167 
00168         notebook1 = micropolisnotebook.MicropolisNotebook(target=self)
00169         self.notebook1 = notebook1
00170 
00171         notebook2 = micropolisnotebook.MicropolisNotebook(target=self)
00172         self.notebook2 = notebook2
00173 
00174         notebook3 = micropolisnotebook.MicropolisNotebook(target=self)
00175         self.notebook3 = notebook3
00176 
00177         # Make the panels in the notebooks.
00178 
00179         noticePanel = micropolisnoticepanel.MicropolisNoticePanel(
00180             engine=engine,
00181             centerOnTileHandler=self.centerOnTileHandler)
00182         self.noticePanel = noticePanel
00183         notebook1.addLabelTab('Notice', noticePanel)
00184 
00185         # @fixme Try to fix the problem of the view's rect being huge on the mini map.
00186         noticePanel.resize_children()
00187 
00188         messagesPanel = micropolismessagespanel.MicropolisMessagesPanel(
00189             engine=engine)
00190         self.messagesPanel = messagesPanel
00191         notebook1.addLabelTab('Messages', messagesPanel)
00192

00194             engine=engine)
00195         self.evaluationPanel = evaluationPanel
00196         notebook1.addLabelTab('Evaluation', evaluationPanel)

00199             engine=engine)

00201         notebook1.addLabelTab('History', historyPanel)

00204             engine=engine)
00205         self.budgetPanel = budgetPanel
00206         notebook1.addLabelTab('Budget', budgetPanel)
00207 
00208         mapPanel = micropolismappanel.MicropolisMapPanel(
00209             engine=engine,
00210             mapViews=[self.navigationMapView, self.editMapView,])
00211         self.mapPanel = mapPanel
00212         notebook1.addLabelTab('Map', mapPanel)
00213 
00214         disastersPanel = micropolisdisasterspanel.MicropolisDisastersPanel(
00215             engine=engine)

00220             engine=engine,
00221             target=self)

00223         notebook1.addLabelTab('Control', controlPanel)

00226

00231         self.vpaned2 = vpaned2
00232 
00233         hpaned1 = gtk.HPaned()
00234         self.hpaned1 = hpaned1
00235 
00236         hpaned2 = gtk.HPaned()
00237         self.hpaned2 = hpaned2
00238 
00239         # Pack the views into the panes.
00240 
00241         vbox1.pack_start(gaugeView, False, False, 0)
00242         vbox1.pack_start(navigationMapView, True, True, 0)
00243 
00244         hpaned1.pack1(vbox1, resize=False, shrink=False)
00245         hpaned1.pack2(notebook1, resize=False, shrink=False)
00246 
00247         hpaned2.pack1(notebook2, resize=False, shrink=False)
00248         hpaned2.pack2(notebook3, resize=False, shrink=False)
00249 
00250         vpaned1.pack1(hpaned1, resize=False, shrink=False)
00251         vpaned1.pack2(vpaned2, resize=False, shrink=False)
00252 
00253         vpaned2.pack1(editMapView, resize=False, shrink=False)
00254         vpaned2.pack2(hpaned2, resize=False, shrink=False)
00255 
00256         modeNotebook.append_page(startPanel)
00257 
00258         modeNotebook.append_page(vpaned1)
00259 
00260         # Put the top level mode notebook in this window.
00261 
00262         self.add(modeNotebook)
00263 
00264         # Load a city file.
00265 
00266         self.startGame()

00269     def update(self, name, *args):
00270 
00271         if name == 'gameMode':
00272 
00273             engine = self.engine
00274             gameMode = engine.gameMode
00275 
00276             navigationMapView = self.navigationMapView
00277             editMapView = self.editMapView
00278             modeNotebook = self.modeNotebook
00279 
00280             if gameMode == 'start':
00281 
00282                 navigationMapView.disengage()
00283                 editMapView.disengage()
00284                 engine.pause()
00285                 modeNotebook.set_current_page(0)
00286 
00287             elif gameMode == 'play':
00288 
00289                 navigationMapView.engage()
00290                 editMapView.engage()
00291                 navigationMapView.updateView()
00292                 editMapView.updateView()
00293                 engine.resume()
00294                 modeNotebook.set_current_page(1)
00295 
00296 
00297     def startGame(self):
00298 
00299         print "==== STARTGAME"
00300 
00301         engine = self.engine
00302 
00303         if False:
00304             cityFileName = 'cities/haight.cty'
00305             #cityFileName = 'cities/yokohama.cty'
00306             print "Loading city file:", cityFileName
00307             engine.loadFile(cityFileName)
00308         else:
00309             self.generateCity()
00310 
00311         # Initialize the simulator engine.
00312 
00313         engine.setSpeed(2)
00314         engine.setCityTax(9)
00315         engine.setEnableDisasters(False)
00316 
00317         self.startMode()
00318 
00319 
00320     def startScenario(self, id):
00321         print "STARTSCENARIO", id
00322         engine = self.engine
00323         engine.loadMetaScenario(id)

00326     def loadCityDialog(self):
00327         print "LOAD CITY DIALOG"
00328 
00329         dialog = gtk.FileChooserDialog(
00330             title='Select a city to load.',
00331             action=gtk.FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN,
00332             buttons=(
00333                 gtk.STOCK_CANCEL,
00334                 gtk.RESPONSE_CANCEL,
00335                 gtk.STOCK_OPEN,
00336                 gtk.RESPONSE_OK,
00337             ))
00338        
00339         filter = gtk.FileFilter()
00340         filter.set_name("Micropolis Cities")
00341         filter.add_pattern("*.xml")
00342         dialog.add_filter(filter)
00343 
00344         citiesFolder = 'cities'
00345         dialog.set_current_folder(citiesFolder)
00346 
00347         response = dialog.run()
00348         if response == gtk.RESPONSE_OK:
00349             fileName = dialog.get_filename()
00350             print "FILENAME", fileName
00351             result = False
00352             try:
00353                 self.engine.loadMetaCity(fileName)
00354                 result = True
00355             except Exception, e:
00356                 print "FAILED TO LOAD META CITY", fileName
00357                 print str(e)
00358                 result = False
00359             print "RESULT", result
00360         elif response == gtk.RESPONSE_CANCEL:
00361             print 'Closed, no files selected'
00362         dialog.destroy()
00363

00365     def generateCity(self):
00366         print "GENERATECITY"
00367         self.engine.generateNewMetaCity()
00368 
00369 
00370     def playCity(self):
00371         print "PLAYCITY"
00372         self.engine.setSpeed(2)
00373         self.engine.setPasses(1)
00374         self.engine.resume()
00375         self.playMode()
00376

00379         print "STARTMODE"
00380         self.engine.setGameMode('start')

00440     def centerOnTileHandler(
00441         self,
00442         tileX,
00443         tileY):
00444 
00445         #print "CENTERONTILEHANDLER", self, tileX, tileY
00446 
00447         editMapView = self.editMapView
00448         editMapView.setScale(1.0)
00449         editMapView.centerOnTile(
00450             tileX,
00451             tileY)

00454     def resizeEdges(
00455         self):
00456 
00457         winRect = self.get_allocation()
00458         winWidth = winRect.width
00459         winHeight = winRect.height
00460 
00461         print "WINDOW SIZE", winWidth, winHeight
00462 
00463         extra = 4
00464         padding = 14
00465 
00466         leftEdge = 120
00467         topEdge = 120
00468 
00469         self.vpaned1.set_position(topEdge + extra)
00470         self.vpaned2.set_position(1000)
00471         self.hpaned1.set_position(150)
00472         self.hpaned2.set_position(1000)
00473 
00474         editMapView = self.editMapView
00475         editMapView.panTo(-200, -200)
00476         editMapView.setScale(1.0)

00480         self,
00481         *args):
00482

00484 
00485         self.firstResize = True

00487 
00488     def handleResize(
00489         self,
00490         widget,
00491         event,
00492         *args):
00493 
00494         #print "handleResize MicropolisPanedWindow", self, "WIDGET", widget, "EVENT", event, "ARGS", args
00495 
00496         if self.firstResize:
00497             self.firstResize = False
00498             self.resizeEdges()

00501     def createWindowNotebook(self, otherNotebook, notebook, page, x, y):
00502 
00503         print "createWindowNotebook", otherNotebook, notebook, page, x, y
00504 
00505         parent = page.get_parent()
00506         print "parent", parent, parent == self.notebook1, parent == self.notebook2, parent == self.notebook3
00507 
00508         for n in (self.notebook1, self.notebook2, self.notebook3):
00509             print n
00510 
00511         if parent == self.notebook1:
00512             return self.notebook2
00513         else:
00514             return self.notebook1
